shri lanka wolibol sammelanaya silon biskat samagame purna anugrahayen pawathwana manchi jathika wolibol shurathawaliye awasan tharaga ada maharagama jathika tharuna sewa sabha gruhastha kridanganayedi pawathwe.ratapura siyalu disthrikkawalin kandayam ekwu jathika wolibola shurathawaliya mathiwarana kottasa , kalapa, palath ha jathika mattamin pawathwu athara me wasaredi kandayam 4000 ikmawima wisheshathwayaki.jathika jyeshta ha kanishta kandayamwala kridaka kridikawan athulathwa pawathi supar lig tharagawaliye kantha awasan tharagayata pasugiya wasare menma me wasaredith shri lanka widesha sewa niyuktha karyansha pila ha shri lanka guwan hamuda kandayama sudusukam laba atha.ema anshaye pirimi  awasan tharagayata shri lanka waraya adhikariya ha shri lanka guwan hamudawa sudusukam labiya.supar lig tharaga wataye pasugiya wasare pirimi jathika shurathawa shri lanka waraya adhikariya ha anushurathawa nawika hamudawa dinagathha.ehi kantha jathika shurathawa widesha sewa niyuktha karyansha pila ha anushurathawa shri lanka guwan hamuda kandayama dinagathha.mathiwarana kottasa walin theri kalapa suratha dina palath mattamata pamina jathika shurathawaliyata piwisi dewani kotase pirimi awasan tharagayata ahaliyagoda shri lanka yuda hamuda krida samajaya ha nuwara yuda hamuda krida samajayada kantha awasan tharagayata torintan krida samajaya ha shri lanka guwan hamuda kandayama sudusukam laba gathha.me tharagawaliye prawina kridaka kridikawan sahabhagiwana palamu kotase surathawa ha anu surathawata rupiyal laksha ekahamarak ha lakshayak da thewani siwuwani sthanawalata haththapan dahasak ha panas dahasak piriname.
